title: Where would be the best place to submit ideas for the game?
body: I have what I think is a really cool idea for the game, want to know where to send it through!

replies.body: Your best bet would be the boards (typically "Player Creations"), though keep in mind OCE has a very low population boards community, or maybe the LoL sub-reddit, as I believe that is a very popular place for LoL discussions, even amongst Rioters (I wouldn't really know, I don't use reddit).

Post it on NA boards, not OCE.

So you can get 1 million downvotes and a bunch of trolls abusing you.
Boards probs, if it gets enough popularity from community then they might see it
